comment: Is there a benefit to using #(id).value and passing it rather than using ngModel? Wouldn't that spare you the need for the keyUp dummy event?

replies.comment: Hi, i followed up your steps but only getting data from Parent works, i can't get data back from Child component. The onchange functions works but not sure why the Parent component can't retrieve the childData
